0:
gitlab_enterprise:
  bot:
    username: Codecov

setup:
  debug: no
  loglvl: INFO

  guest_access: off
  admins:
    - service: gitlab_enterprise
      username: Saphir
    - service: gitlab_enterprise
      username: Alexsaphir

  http:
    cookies_domain: ${DOMAIN_NAME}

  timeseries:
    enabled: false

  telemetry:
    enabled: false

notifications:
  slack: off
  gitter: off
  webhook: off
  irc: off
  hipchat: off

until pg_isready -h vaultwarden-postgresql-rw -U vaultwarden; do
  echo "Waiting for PostgreSQL to be ready..."
  sleep 2
done

; <?php exit; ?> DO NOT REMOVE THIS LINE
[system]
timezone = "Europe/Berlin"
[error]
output = "http"
